name: Kevin
homeDescription: Dedicated to building modern and useful web applications.

education.title: Education
education.iii: Institute for Information Industry - Front-end Engineering Program (2022.03~2022.08)

university.title: University Period
university.content:
During 4 years of university, I joined the tennis club and served as a teaching director for 2 years, guiding over 15 beginners from zero to winning the inter-school championship.
In the meteorology group, I collaborated with classmates to produce 24 daily temperature and rainfall forecasts weekly for half a year, achieving accuracy comparable to the weather bureau.

military.title: Military Service
military.content:
Enlisted as a volunteer soldier and joined the honor guard for over 2 years. Mainly responsible for recording and organizing training and physical conditions of over 100 personnel in the company.
Assisted in logistics support for annual Double Ten Day and New Year's Day events, and venue preparation for state leader visits at the Presidential Office.

career.title: Career Transition
career.content:
Started learning programming with C, mastering basics like variable declaration, loops, and pointers.
Used Python for LeetCode practice, and upon discovering frontend development, I found great interest in the 'what you see is what you code' paradigm, which led to my decision to become a frontend engineer.

training.title: III Training Program
training.content:
Participated in the Institute for Information Industry's Frontend Engineering Program. Collaborated with an 8-person team to develop a coffee shop e-commerce website using React, Node, and MySQL.
Self-learned Vue options/composition API during spare time.

wiwynn.title: Wiwynn Corporation
wiwynn.content:
Worked as a Frontend Engineer at Wiwynn Corporation, responsible for developing and refactoring multiple key projects.
Successfully implemented TypeScript and Redux-Toolkit in legacy projects and upgraded Webpack, significantly improving team development efficiency and code quality.
Refactored the budget management system using AG-Grid and Socket.IO, implementing data visualization and real-time collaborative editing with Chart.js.
Developed multiple React and React Native applications, including factory scheduling system, automated purchasing system, and supplier mold inventory app, gaining experience in web, mobile, and desktop application development.
